plot: Oscar winning creature creator and make-up artist Barney Burman joins the cast and crew in an in-depth behind-the-scenes tour of the make-up and visual effects wizardry that goes into each episode of Grimm.
title: Grimm: Grimm Makeup & VFX
plot_es: Oscar winning creature creator and make-up artist Barney Burman joins the cast and crew in an in-depth behind-the-scenes tour of the make-up and visual effects wizardry that goes into each episode of Grimm.
plot_en: Oscar winning creature creator and make-up artist Barney Burman joins the cast and crew in an in-depth behind-the-scenes tour of the make-up and visual effects wizardry that goes into each episode of Grimm.
